title: Luxury two bedroom apartment at 7th Sense
details:
Two bedroom apartment for immediate sale by owner to the highest offer at the exclusive 7th Sense condominium on Gregory’s Road, Colombo 07. A 1,301 Sq.Ft. contemporary design including a dressing room and ensuite bathroom in the master bedroom.

The facilities at this prestigious and exclusive address include swimming pool, sauna, steam room and half an acre of rooftop recreational space.

Serious buyers/ principals only. Priced at LKR 82 million but accepting reasonable offers for consideration.
